faq.title: FAQ
faq.intro: Common questions about using TrimTime and booking appointments.
faq.q1: How do I book an appointment?
faq.a1: Open a salon, choose services and time, then confirm the booking.
faq.a2: Yes — open the booking and choose cancel. You may be asked to provide a reason.
faq.q3: What happens if I’m running late?
faq.a3: If you are more than 15 minutes late, your slot may be given to another customer.
faq.q4: Can I book multiple services together?
faq.a4: Yes, you can add multiple services in one booking.
faq.a5: Yes, walk-ins are allowed, but availability is not guaranteed.
faq.q6: How do I know which service is right for me?
faq.a6: Each service has a short description and estimated time to help you choose.
faq.q7: Do you offer bridal or special event packages?
faq.a7: Yes, we have bridal, party, and event packages. You can find them in the "Packages" section.
faq.a8: Yes, we provide haircuts and grooming services for kids.
faq.q9: Can I change my selected stylist after booking?
faq.a9: Yes, you can request a change if the stylist is available.
faq.q10: What if I need customer support?
faq.a10: You can reach us through live chat or call our customer care number anytime.

terms.title: Terms & Privacy
terms.intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the app.
terms.section1_text: TrimTime provides a platform to discover and book salon services. Your use is subject to local laws and salon policies.
terms.section2_text: All appointments depend on service and stylist availability. You will receive a confirmation after booking.
terms.section3_text: Cancel or reschedule at least 2 hours before your appointment. Late cancellations may be charged.
terms.section4_text: We accept online payments and cash (if available). Some services may require advance payment.
terms.section5_text: Arriving more than 15 minutes late may lead to automatic cancellation.
terms.section6_text: Service prices and durations may vary. Inform the staff immediately if you face any issue with the service.
terms.section7_text: Available only in selected areas. Customers must provide a safe and clean environment.
terms.section8_text: We maintain high hygiene standards. Please inform us if you have allergies or sensitive skin.
terms.section9_text: Refunds are only provided for failed bookings or double payments, not after service completion.
terms.section10_text: Your personal information is kept secure and used only for service-related purposes.
terms.section11_text: We may modify these terms anytime without prior notice.
